name: FPS PROTOTYBE
description:
Controls:

Regular movment WSAD to move and move mouse  to look around

ADS right mouse

Shoot Left mouse

Sprint Left shift

Jump Space

Here it get's little complex

i have 2 diffrent weapon handling which i like and don't know what to use so i did add the two of them so you decide Press F1 and F2 to switch between them that includes the sprinting weapon handling.

the game includes full weapon loadout system but not ready yet so you can change optic using alpha numbers from 1 to 9 just for now that's not prolonged.

To change optic mode for Hamr scope hold T and scroll using scroll wheel.

to change quality press Left ctrl + Z or X settings gets saved automatically.
